HateSpeech_2.0.TEXT:
"We know that b/w #AffirmativeAction & athletes, a significant number of blacks don't get into college based on merit #BlackOnCampus"
"#Mizzou has taken cucked to new heights. Liberal wymynz defending their rapists. Dindus demanding more gibsmedats be gibs to dem. Lol. Wtaf?"
"It must be awful to be named Muhammad, when you realise that you're named after the worst child-raping psycho in the history of the world."
"white women are so stupid. ugh"
"I'll never support fat people. I believe in strength and perseverance. I'll never condone weakness and call it acceptance."
"Sports, especially physical sports, emulate war. Athletes are mostly under-developed men with no agency who "play" at being soldiers."
"Can't we just admit that collegiate sports are a joke? You take ghetto hoodrats and let them go to skoo cuz they play sportsball. Lol"
"Evolution will work itself out. Whites are awakening. And we will triumph over the muddy degenerate masses of muds like we always have."
"Before feminism, before Marxism, classical liberalism was already a chaos-worshipping death cult seeking to destroy civilisation."
"Why do people care about blacks when blacks don’t even care about themselves or the welfare of others?"
